name: Minami no Shima Ni Buta Ga Ita: Lucas no Daibouken
overview: Minami no Shima ni Buta ga Ita : Lucas No Dai Boken (南の島にブタがいた ルーカスの大冒険) is a puzzle game developed by Scholar and published by Virgin Interactive for the Sega Saturn. A very simple looking and playing puzzle / mini game hybrid. After failed to get the eggs from a tree, Lucas (the pig) returned to the village that he lives to see your son. But a bird kidnapped him and now Lucas must save your son. Guide your piggy through several challenges and have loads of fun on this quirky island!
